biocontainers.name: fastspar
biocontainers.summary: Rapid and scalable correlation estimation for compositional data

biotools.summary: FastSpar is a C++ implementation of the SparCC algorithm for fast correlation estimation from compositional count data such as microbiome OTU tables.

galaxy.summary: Tool for rapid and scalable correlation estimation for compositional data.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: FastSpar is a C++ implementation of the SparCC algorithm for fast correlation estimation from compositional count data such as microbiome OTU tables.
